com.linecorp.armeria.common.logging

Interface RequestLogBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRequestLog

    public interface RequestLogBuilder
    Updates a RequestLog with newly available information.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static RequestLogBuilder NOOP
      A dummy RequestLogBuilder that discards everything it collected.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deferRequestContent()
      Allows the requestContent(Object) called after endRequest().
      void deferResponseContent()
      Allows the responseContent(Object) called after endResponse().
      void endRequest()
      Sets RequestLog.requestDurationNanos() and finishes the collection of the information.
      void endRequest(java.lang.Throwable requestCause)
      Sets RequestLog.requestDurationNanos() and finishes the collection of the information.
      void endResponse()
      Sets RequestLog.responseDurationNanos() and finishes the collection of the information.
      void endResponse(java.lang.Throwable responseCause)
      Sets RequestLog.responseDurationNanos() and finishes the collection of the information.
      void increaseRequestLength(long deltaBytes)
      Increases the RequestLog.requestLength() by deltaBytes.
      void increaseResponseLength(long deltaBytes)
      Increases the RequestLog.responseLength() by deltaBytes.
      boolean isRequestContentDeferred()
      Returns true if deferRequestContent() was ever called.
      boolean isResponseContentDeferred()
      Returns true if deferResponseContent() was ever called.

      Sets the RequestLog.requestContent().

      Sets the RequestLog.requestEnvelope().

      Sets the RequestLog.requestLength().

      Sets the RequestLog.responseContent().
      void responseEnvelope(java.lang.Object responseEnvelope)
      Sets the RequestLog.responseEnvelope().
      void responseLength(long responseLength)
      Sets the RequestLog.responseLength().
      void serializationFormat(SerializationFormat serializationFormat)
      Sets the SerializationFormat.
      void startRequest(Channel channel, SessionProtocol sessionProtocol, java.lang.String host, java.lang.String method, java.lang.String path)
      Starts the collection of information for the Request.
      void startResponse()
      Starts the collection of information for the Response.
      void statusCode(int statusCode)
      Sets the status code specific to the current SessionProtocol.

    • Field Detail

      • NOOP

        static final RequestLogBuilder NOOP
        A dummy RequestLogBuilder that discards everything it collected.

    • Method Detail

      • startRequest

        void startRequest(Channel channel,
                  SessionProtocol sessionProtocol,
                  java.lang.String host,
                  java.lang.String method,
                  java.lang.String path)
        Starts the collection of information for the Request. This method sets the following properties:
        • RequestLog.requestStartTimeMillis()
        • RequestLog.sessionProtocol()
        • RequestLog.host()
        • RequestLog.method()
        • RequestLog.path()

      • serializationFormat

        void serializationFormat(SerializationFormat serializationFormat)
        Sets the SerializationFormat.

      • increaseRequestLength

        void increaseRequestLength(long deltaBytes)
        Increases the RequestLog.requestLength() by deltaBytes.

      • requestLength

        void requestLength(long requestLength)
        Sets the RequestLog.requestLength().

      • requestEnvelope

        void requestEnvelope(java.lang.Object requestEnvelope)
        Sets the RequestLog.requestEnvelope().

      • requestContent

        void requestContent(java.lang.Object requestContent)
        Sets the RequestLog.requestContent().

      • deferRequestContent

        void deferRequestContent()
        Allows the requestContent(Object) called after endRequest(). By default, if requestContent(Object) was not called yet, endRequest() will call requestContent(null) automatically. This method turns off this default behavior. Note, however, this method will not prevent endRequest(Throwable) from calling requestContent(null) automatically.

      • isRequestContentDeferred

        boolean isRequestContentDeferred()
        Returns true if deferRequestContent() was ever called.

      • endRequest

        void endRequest()
        Sets RequestLog.requestDurationNanos() and finishes the collection of the information.

      • endRequest

        void endRequest(java.lang.Throwable requestCause)
        Sets RequestLog.requestDurationNanos() and finishes the collection of the information.

      • startResponse

        void startResponse()
        Starts the collection of information for the Response. This method sets RequestLog.responseStartTimeMillis().

      • statusCode

        void statusCode(int statusCode)
        Sets the status code specific to the current SessionProtocol.

      • increaseResponseLength

        void increaseResponseLength(long deltaBytes)
        Increases the RequestLog.responseLength() by deltaBytes.

      • responseLength

        void responseLength(long responseLength)
        Sets the RequestLog.responseLength().

      • responseEnvelope

        void responseEnvelope(java.lang.Object responseEnvelope)
        Sets the RequestLog.responseEnvelope().

      • responseContent

        void responseContent(java.lang.Object responseContent)
        Sets the RequestLog.responseContent().

      • deferResponseContent

        void deferResponseContent()
        Allows the responseContent(Object) called after endResponse(). By default, if responseContent(Object) was not called yet, endResponse() will call responseContent(null) automatically. This method turns off this default behavior. Note, however, this method will not prevent endResponse(Throwable) from calling responseContent(null) automatically.

      • isResponseContentDeferred

        boolean isResponseContentDeferred()
        Returns true if deferResponseContent() was ever called.

      • endResponse

        void endResponse()
        Sets RequestLog.responseDurationNanos() and finishes the collection of the information.

      • endResponse

        void endResponse(java.lang.Throwable responseCause)
        Sets RequestLog.responseDurationNanos() and finishes the collection of the information.
